languages.text: At the end of each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} this creature suffers 10 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} but gains a stacking +5 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}. Also, at the end of its turn, this creature makes one attack against everyone within its {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g}.

traits.locale_text: At the end of each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} this creature suffers 10 direct damage but gains a stacking +5 damage {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}. Also, at the end of its turn, this creature makes one attack against everyone within its {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}melee range{/g}.

At the end of each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} this creature suffers 10 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} but gains a stacking +5 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}. Also, at the end of its turn, this creature makes one attack against everyone within its {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g}.

At the end of each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} this creature suffers 10 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} but gains a stacking +5 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}. Also, at the end of its turn, this creature makes one attack against everyone within its {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g}.

languages.text: 每个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束时，此生物受到10点{g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}直击伤害{/g}，但所有攻击造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}提高5点，此效果可叠加。此外，此生物回合结束时，会自动对{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战范围{/g}内所有生物发动一次攻击。
languages.original_text: At the end of each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} this creature suffers 10 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} but gains a stacking +5 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}. Also, at the end of its turn, this creature makes one attack against everyone within its {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 每个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束时，此生物受到10点直击伤害伤害，但所有攻击造成的效果提高5点，此效果可叠加。{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}此外，此生物回合结束时，会自动对{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}近战范围{/g}内所有生物发动一次攻击。

languages.text: В конце каждого {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} существо получает 10 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}прямого урона{/g}, но вместе с тем суммирующийся {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} к наносимому {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урону{/g} +5. Также в конце своего хода существо совершает одну атаку против всех целей в радиусе {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнего боя{/g}.
languages.original_text: At the end of each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} this creature suffers 10 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} but gains a stacking +5 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}. Also, at the end of its turn, this creature makes one attack against everyone within its {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g}.

traits.locale_text: В конце каждого {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} существо получает 10 прямого урона, но вместе с тем суммирующийся {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} к наносимому урону +5. Также в конце своего хода существо совершает одну атаку против всех целей в радиусе {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}ближнего боя{/g}.

В конце каждого {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} существо получает 10 прямого урона, но вместе с тем суммирующийся {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} к наносимому урону +5. Также в конце своего хода существо совершает одну атаку против всех целей в радиусе {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}ближнего боя{/g}.

languages.text: 各{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の終了時、この生物は10の{g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}直接ダメージ{/g}を受けるが、+5の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}を得る。また、そのターンの終了時に、この生物はその{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接範囲内{/g}にいるすべての者に対して1回攻撃を行う。
languages.original_text: At the end of each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} this creature suffers 10 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} but gains a stacking +5 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}. Also, at the end of its turn, this creature makes one attack against everyone within its {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 各{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}終了時、この生物は10の直接ダメージを受けるが、+5のダメージ{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}を得る。また、そのターン終了時、この生物はその{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}近接範囲{/g}内にいるすべての者に対して1回攻撃を行う。

languages.text: Al final de cada {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, esta criatura sufre 10 de {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}daño directo{/g} pero gana una {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} de +5 de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} acumulativa. Además, al final de su turno la criatura lanza un ataque contra todas las criaturas en su {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}alcance cuerpo a cuerpo{/g}.
languages.original_text: At the end of each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} this creature suffers 10 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} but gains a stacking +5 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}. Also, at the end of its turn, this creature makes one attack against everyone within its {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Al final de cada {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, esta criatura sufre 10 de daño directo pero gana una {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} de +5 de daño acumulativa. Además, al final de su turno la criatura lanza un ataque contra todas las criaturas en su {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}alcance cuerpo a cuerpo{/g}.

languages.text: Am Ende jedes {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} erleidet diese Kreatur 10 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}Direktschaden{/g}, aber erhält einen stapelbaren {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} von +5 auf {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}. Außerdem führt diese Kreatur am Ende ihres Zuges einen Angriff gegen alle Feinde in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfreichweite{/g} aus.
languages.original_text: At the end of each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} this creature suffers 10 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} but gains a stacking +5 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}. Also, at the end of its turn, this creature makes one attack against everyone within its {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Am Ende jedes {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} erleidet diese Kreatur 10 Direktschaden, aber erhält einen stapelbaren {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} von +5 Schaden. Außerdem führt diese Kreatur am Ende ihres Zuges einen Angriff gegen jeden in ihrer {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}Nahkampfreichweite{/g} aus.

languages.text: À la fin de chaque {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, cette créature subit 10 points de {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}dégâts directs{/g}, mais reçoit un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de +5 points de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g}. En outre, à la fin de son tour, elle lance une attaque contre tout personnage à {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}portée de combat de mêlée{/g}.
languages.original_text: At the end of each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} this creature suffers 10 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} but gains a stacking +5 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}. Also, at the end of its turn, this creature makes one attack against everyone within its {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g}.

traits.locale_text: À la fin de chaque {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, cette créature subit 10 points de dégâts directs, mais reçoit un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de +5 points de dégâts. En outre, à la fin de son tour, elle lance une attaque contre tout personnage à {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}portée de combat de mêlée{/g}.

languages.text: Bu yaratık, her {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turun{/g} sonunda 10 puan {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}doğrudan hasara{/g} maruz kalır ancak yaptığı saldırılarda üst üste birikebilen +5 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonusu{/g} elde eder. Yaratık, ayrıca turunun sonunda {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş menzili{/g} içinde bulunan herkese karşı bir saldırı gerçekleştirir.

Also, at the end of its turn, this creature makes one attack against everyone within its {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g}.
